20110116020545.000|20110116020546.000|CC1|BEING CRITICIZED FOR DISPELLING 
20110116020546.000|20110116020547.000|CC1|JARED LOUGHNER RATHER THAN      
20110116020547.000|20110116020550.000|CC1|REFERRING HIM TO MENTAL HEALTH  
20110116020550.000|20110116020551.000|CC1|EXPERTS.                        
20110116020551.000|20110116020551.000|CC1|NOW UCLA IS TAKING ACTION TO    
20110116020551.000|20110116020552.000|CC1|MAKE SURE ITS STUDENTS GET THE  
20110116020552.000|20110116020554.000|CC1|PROPER HELP IF THEY SHOW        
20110116020554.000|20110116020558.000|CC1|DISRUPTIVE OR DISTURBING        
20110116020558.000|20110116020601.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR.                       
20110116020601.000|20110116020603.000|CC1|ANGIE CROUCH HAS THOSE DETAILS. 
20110116020603.000|20110116020604.000|CC1|>> PIMA COMMUNITY COLLEGE IN    
20110116020604.000|20110116020606.000|CC1|TUCSON, ARIZONA, CAME UNDER A   
20110116020606.000|20110116020607.000|CC1|LOT OF CRITICISM FOR EXPELLING  
20110116020607.000|20110116020609.000|CC1|JARED LOUGHNER, BUT NOT         
20110116020609.000|20110116020611.000|CC1|REFERRING HIM TO MENTAL HEALTH  
20110116020611.000|20110116020611.000|CC1|EXPERTS.                        
20110116020611.000|20110116020613.000|CC1|SO IN LIGHT OF THAT CRITICISM,  
20110116020613.000|20110116020615.000|CC1|TONIGHT UCLA IS TRYING TO BE A  
20110116020615.000|20110116020616.000|CC1|LITTLE MORE PROACTIVE.          
20110116020616.000|20110116020618.000|CC1|THEY'VE ANNOUNCED A PROGRAM TO  
20110116020618.000|20110116020621.000|CC1|TRY AND HELP STEM ANY KIND OF   
20110116020621.000|20110116020623.000|CC1|VIOLENCE HERE ON THE CAMPUS.    
20110116020623.000|20110116020626.000|CC1|NOW, THE DEAN OF STUDENTS,      
20110116020626.000|20110116020627.000|CC1|ROBERT NAPLES, SENT A LETTER TO 
20110116020627.000|20110116020629.000|CC1|FACULTY AND STUDENTS ANNOUNCING 
20110116020629.000|20110116020632.000|CC1|A PROGRAM CALLED THE RED-FOLDER 
20110116020632.000|20110116020632.000|CC1|INITIATIVE.                     
20110116020632.000|20110116020633.000|CC1|THIS PROGRAM SETS UP A SYSTEM   
20110116020633.000|20110116020635.000|CC1|FOR INTERVENING WHEN A STUDENT  
20110116020635.000|20110116020638.000|CC1|DISPLAYED TROUBLING BEHAVIOR.   
20110116020638.000|20110116020640.000|CC1|THE DEAN'S LETTER SAYS IT'S A   
20110116020640.000|20110116020642.000|CC1|STARK REMINDER OF UCLA'S SHARED 
20110116020642.000|20110116020643.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY TO USE CAMPUS    
20110116020643.000|20110116020645.000|CC1|RESOURCES TO INTERVENE WHEN A   
20110116020645.000|20110116020647.000|CC1|STUDENT HAS MENTAL PROBLEMS IN  
20110116020647.000|20110116020648.000|CC1|ORDER TO PREVENT AN ESCALATION  
20110116020648.000|20110116020652.000|CC1|OF THE SITUATION AND KEEP THE   
20110116020652.000|20110116020655.000|CC1|STUDENTS AND OTHERS SAFE.       
20110116020655.000|20110116020657.000|CC1|THERE WILL BE A 24-HOUR HOTLINE 
20110116020657.000|20110116020659.000|CC1|AND AN ANONYMOUS TIP LINE WHERE 
20110116020659.000|20110116020701.000|CC1|PEOPLE CAN REPORT DISTURBING    
20110116020701.000|20110116020701.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR.                       
20110116020701.000|20110116020703.000|CC1|THE LETTER SAYS, QUOTE, IF YOU  
20110116020703.000|20110116020705.000|CC1|OBSERVE BEHAVIOR THAT IS        
20110116020705.000|20110116020707.000|CC1|CONCERNING, TAKE ACTION TO GET  
20110116020707.000|20110116020709.000|CC1|HELP FOR THE STUDENT BY EITHER  
20110116020709.000|20110116020710.000|CC1|REFERRING THE STUDENT DIRECTLY  
20110116020710.000|20110116020712.000|CC1|OR CONSULTING WITH A CAMPUS     
20110116020712.000|20110116020714.000|CC1|SPECIALIST WHO CAN HELP YOU.    
20110116020714.000|20110116020714.000|CC1|TODAY WE GOT REACTION FROM      
20110116020714.000|20110116020718.000|CC1|STUDENTS.                       
20110116020718.000|20110116020720.000|CC1|>> ESPECIALLY, YOU KNOW, ON THE 
20110116020720.000|20110116020722.000|CC1|CAMPUS IN LOS ANGELES, IN       
20110116020722.000|20110116020723.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA, THERE'S A BIG
